meanings.sent1: My grandniece visited me during the holidays.
meanings.sent2: My grandniece loves playing with her dolls.
meanings.sent3: When my grandniece tried to teach me how to use social media, it was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the house, filling it with joy like a grandniece's presence.
meanings.sent5: The image of my grandniece's bright smile is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: The daughter of one's niece or nephew.
meanings.sent1: I am excited to meet my new grandniece next week.
meanings.sent2: My grandniece is growing up so fast!
meanings.sent3: Watching my grandniece try to imitate my dance moves was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was like a beacon, guiding her as a grandniece exploring the world.
meanings.sent5: The bond between a grandniece and her aunt is truly special.
